description: The table contains information of a handoff field.

columns.name: HANDOFF_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the handoff data record.

columns.name: PAT_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the patient contact on which the Handoff was written.

columns.name: SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The service of the handoff field.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PURPOSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item defines the purpose of the handoff field.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Summary


To Do


Medications


Labs


Imaging

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant the record was last locked/unlocked.
